verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Worship the King
Our God and Creator
Bow low before Him
All the earth
Sing of His praise
In great Adoration
Worship our Lord
And tell of His worth

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Worthy is God
Our light and salvation
Holy is He
And Mighty to save
He won our freedom
There on the cross
Triumphed victorious
When He rose from the grave

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus is Lord
And reigneth forever
There on the throne
Our ruler is He
Praise Him ye heavens
Praise Him ye people
Jesus is Lord
And ever shall be
